title: MEAN-stack Development Environment with Docker, TypeScript and Live Reloading
tags: angular, node, mean, mongodb, web, docker, typescript
snippet: In this post I will go over how to set up a development environment based on the popular MEAN-stack (MongoDB, Express, Angular, Node.js) with docker-compose and Node+Express configured with TypeScript.It will have live reloading on code changes on both the client and server using docker volumes. ...
